text: Hagi Jodani timofo kama zage hanati kaziga Mosese'ma tamagri'ma tami'nea mopare a' mofavre'tamine, memene sipisipine bulimakao afuzagatamine manigahaze. Hianagi tamagripinti'ma ha'ma nehaza vene'ne'amo'za tina takahe'zma kantu kaziga vu'za, zamafuhe'ina ugota hu'za zamazahu'za hara ome hugahaze.
